about.info: Experienced Software Engineer with demonstrated working history in different organisations (government agency, software solution and foreign exchange companies).
Skilled in C#, ASP.Net, MS SQL, Azure, WPF, Power Apps, React.js, JavaScript, jQuery and Bootstrap.
Previous experiences include working at Trade Me as Full Stack Developer (Fixed Term), and Software Engineer at the Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment.

Also worked in an Agile cross-functional team at Datacom (Fixed Term) to deliver a software application for local councils in New Zealand and Australia. The work I did in Infor is to migrate the codebase of an existing enterprise application from Windows Form to ASP.Net MVC. We leveraged Web Services and XML while working with our Australian counterparts to deliver the desired solution. We used JavaScript and jQuery for front-end and, aside from development, I was assigned to build and deploy our server for my QA team for their testing processes. Also, I mentored one of my new team members. I have experience working with small teams to develop trading platforms using C#, WPF and SQL for foreign exchange companies.

I like to solve problems on my own and find satisfaction when the solutions I developed are working. However, I also believe that working collaboratively with a team is crucial to delivery of the product. So, if there is a particularly difficult problem, I collaborate with my colleagues and use it as a learning experience to improve my skills.
I enjoy learning new technologies and gets satisfaction with the new applications I create. I love to bake, cook, take photographs, cycle, travel and play games with friends.
Looking forward to connecting with ICT professionals.

projects.name: GloomBlue
projects.description: A simple weather app created using React.js that displays the weather information based on the inputted city name. It consumes data from OpenWeatherMap and uses https://datahub.io/core/country-list to convert country code based on 2 digit codes (ISO 3166-1) into their full name. Map can also be displayed (provided by react-leaflet) base on the geo coordinates of the city.

projects.name: Artist's Popular Tracks | Spotify
projects.description: A simple app created using React.js that lists the popular songs from a particular artist. The app displays the album cover and some info upon clicking on the song (card). This utilizes Spotify's APIs to search for artist id, albums, and songs.
